org.jooq
Interface FieldProvider

All Known Subinterfaces:
Record, Result<R>, Select<R>, SelectConditionStep, SelectFinalStep, SelectFromStep, SelectGroupByStep, SelectHavingStep, SelectJoinStep, SelectLimitStep, SelectOrderByStep, SelectQuery, SelectWhereStep, SimpleSelectConditionStep<R>, SimpleSelectFinalStep<R>, SimpleSelectLimitStep<R>, SimpleSelectOrderByStep<R>, SimpleSelectQuery<R>, SimpleSelectWhereStep<R>, Table<R>, TableRecord<R>, Type<R>, UDT<R>, UDTRecord<R>, UpdatableRecord<R>, UpdatableTable<R>
All Known Implementing Classes:
RecordImpl, TableImpl, TableRecordImpl, UDTImpl, UDTRecordImpl, UpdatableRecordImpl, UpdatableTableImpl
public interface FieldProvider

An object (not necessarily a QueryPart) that holds a list of Fields. Especially the getField(Field) method is interesting, as it may return an aliased version of the given field

Author:
Lukas Eder

Method Summary

getField(Field<T> field)
          Get a specific field from this field provider.

Method Detail

getField

<T> Field<T> getField(Field<T> field)
Get a specific field from this field provider.

Usually, this will return the field itself. However, if this is an aliased table, the field will be aliased accordingly.

Type Parameters:
T - The generic field type
Parameters:
field - The field to fetch
Returns:
The field itself or an aliased field

getField

Field<?> getField(java.lang.String name)
Get a specific field from this field provider.

Parameters:
name - The field to fetch
Returns:
The field with the given name

getFields

java.util.List<Field<?>> getFields()
Returns:
All available fields
